pages.text: An imperfect ritual that channels the defensive power of the Warden, granting the user an impenetrable obsidian cloak.$(br2)$(bold)Setup:$()$(br)Place a Sculk Block on top of an Imperfect Ritual Stone.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() 3000 LP per use$(br2)$(bold)Duration:$() 15 minutes$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() The ritual activates once and completes immediately. The stone can be reused.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$()$(br)Right-click the Imperfect Ritual Stone to receive:$(li)$(thing)Obsidian Cloak$() for 15 minutes$(br2)$(bold)Obsidian Cloak:$()$(br)Dramatically reduces incoming damage, making you nearly invulnerable to most attacks.$(br2)$(bold)Use Cases:$()$(li)Boss fights$(li)Dangerous exploration$(li)PvP combat$(li)Mining in hazardous areas$(br2)$(italic)The darkness protects.$()
